summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; declaring the former Sunnydale Substation (PMA 609) located at 15002 8th Avenue South in Burien, Washington, to be surplus to The City of Seattle's needs; authorizing its sale to the Port of Seattle; authorizing the Superintendent of the City Light Department to execute a Purchase and Sale Agreement and other documents in connection therewith; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
